description:
Use this setting to block Windows Security notifications to your users for all of the preceding feature settings. Alternatively, you can manage the Windows Security app notifications per feature by using the proceeding settings.
When this setting is set to Not configured, all Windows Security app notifications that are not controlled by another setting are allowed. By setting Block non-critical notifications, notifications such as scan completions are blocked. By setting Block all notifications, critical and non-critical notifications are blocked for all Windows Security features.
